title: Build your first deck
paragraphs: First and foremost: make sure you're logged in using your account
Once you're in, you will be able to click on the 'Build' button in the header (the hammer one)
This will prompt a window where you can establish your new deck name. Save it and boom!, congrats on making your first deck
After saving it, you will be redirected to the actual builder where you can use the Card Search tool to add Pokémon, Trainers, and Energy
See live deck stats (type distribution, average energy cost, etc.) as more cards are added
You can also change its name and make it public or private to other users
Save it and...done. Your new deck appears in your profile

title: View and share your deck
paragraphs: Open your deck from your profile to check decklist and stats
Copy the deck link to share with friends or post online

title: Search decks, cards and users
paragraphs: Use the search bar to toggle between cards, decks and users

title: Explore profiles and favorites
paragraphs: Check any user profile to see their decks and what they've favorited. Add decks to your own favorites to revisit later

title: Customize your experience and get to know more
paragraphs: Click the ☰ side menu → toggle Light/Dark theme
Access Privacy Policy, Terms and Copyright info using the side menu or the footer at any time
